metadata.title: Murilo Silva Moraes - Front-end Developer

home.name: Murilo Moraes
home.description: Front-end developer with over 5 years of experience in React, React Native and Next.js. Specialized in creating modern web and mobile applications for companies and startups.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio - Next.js 14
portfolio.description: üåê This is the website you are browsing right now! My modern personal portfolio developed with Next.js 14, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, with complete internationalization system.
portfolio.longDescription: This is my current personal portfolio, developed from scratch with the most modern technologies on the market. The project demonstrates my technical skills through a real, functional and optimized application. It achieved 100% in all Google Lighthouse metrics, demonstrating excellence in performance, accessibility, best practices and SEO.

challenges.4: International SEO and dynamic meta tags

digitalEazy.title: Digital Eazy - Digital Wallet
digitalEazy.description: üí≥ Digital wallet application developed with Ionic and Angular, offering a complete solution for mobile payments and financial management.
digitalEazy.longDescription: Digital Eazy was an innovative digital wallet project I developed using Ionic and Angular. The application offered a complete mobile financial management experience, including transfers, payments, transaction history, and secure authentication. The backend was built with Node.js and Firebase, ensuring scalability and security in financial transactions.

electroluxSystem.title: Electrolux Corporate System
electroluxSystem.description: üè≠ Internal system developed for Electrolux tablets during the pandemic, allowing employees to answer daily health and safety questionnaires.
electroluxSystem.longDescription: During the pandemic, I developed a critical system for Electrolux that was installed on tablets distributed throughout the company. The system allowed employees to answer mandatory daily questionnaires about health and symptoms, contributing to internal sanitary control. Developed with Ionic and Angular, the system worked offline and synchronized data when connected, ensuring continuous operation even with network instabilities.

challenges.0: Development of critical system in record time

koskGo.title: Kiosk Go - Autonomous Supermarket
koskGo.description: üõí Revolutionary application for autonomous supermarkets in Germany, enabling queue-free shopping through advanced self-service technology.
koskGo.longDescription: Kiosk Go was an international project I developed for the German market, focused on revolutionizing the supermarket shopping experience. The application allowed users to scan products, make automatic payments, and leave without going through traditional checkouts. Using Ionic and Angular on the frontend, with Node.js and MongoDB backend, the system integrated with various European payment systems and offered a completely autonomous shopping experience.

tocaki.title: TOCAKI - Musicians Platform
tocaki.description: üéµ Application that connects freelance musicians with establishments like bars and restaurants, facilitating bookings for live performances.
tocaki.longDescription: TOCAKI was an innovative platform I developed to connect freelance musicians with bar owners, restaurants, and other establishments. The application worked as a musical marketplace, where musicians could create profiles with their specialties, availability, and prices, while establishment owners could search and hire artists for events. Developed with Ionic and Angular, it included real-time chat system, geolocation, and rating system.

footer.description: Front-end developer with +5 years of experience in React, React Native, Next.js and modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Technology-passionate developer, always seeking new challenges and opportunities to create innovative solutions.
about.name: Murilo Silva Moraes

bio.paragraph1: I'm a Front-end developer with over 5 years of experience specialized in React, React Native, Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. My journey includes working on large-scale projects, from web and mobile applications to full stack solutions with Node.js and Firebase.
bio.paragraph2: I have experience in the public sector, fintechs, international companies and digital entertainment platforms. I'm familiar with mobile publishing (EAS Build, TestFlight), deep linking, notifications and JWT/OAuth authentication. I work with agile teams (Scrum/Kanban) and integrate easily with technical and product squads.
bio.paragraph3: Located in Itapema/SC, I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to create innovative solutions. I have technical English for reading and writing in development contexts.

experience1.title: Front-end Developer
experience1.description: Development of web and mobile systems with React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS and React Native. Working on large-scale platforms in the digital entertainment sector, focusing on affiliation and engagement systems. Integration with OAuth, JWT authentication and metrics systems.

experience2.title: Full Stack Developer
experience2.description: Complete development of solutions for the Municipality of Itapema/SC: Ecological trails app for tourism and Public works management system. Responsible for architecture, authentication, integrations and front/back infrastructure.

experience3.title: Front-end Developer (freelancer)
experience3.description: Development of customized solutions for various clients. Featured projects: Internal control system for Electrolux during the pandemic, 'Kiosk Go' for autonomous supermarkets in the German market, Front-end for Brazilian fintech.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Some of the most common questions I receive

q1.question: What types of projects do you accept?
q1.answer: I work with full-stack web development, from landing pages to complex applications. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node.js and cloud solutions.

q2.question: What is the average delivery time?
q2.answer: It depends on the project complexity. Simple sites: 1-2 weeks. More complex applications: 1-3 months. I always discuss realistic timelines before starting.

q3.question: Do you offer post-delivery support?
q3.answer: Yes! I offer 30 days of free support for bug fixes. I also provide ongoing maintenance plans for larger projects.

q4.question: How does the work process work?
q4.answer: 1) Initial conversation to understand your needs, 2) Proposal and budget, 3) Down payment, 4) Development with regular updates, 5) Delivery and support.
